DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Multi-Center Study Anterior Lens Capsulotomy Using Mynosys Zepto System
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate outcome subject elect Zepto capsulotomies cataract surgery phacoemulsification evaluate safety effectiveness . The primary effectiveness endpoint complete capsulotomy least 95 percent case . The primary safety endpoint posterior capsular rupture virtuous loss 4 percent less subject . Other parameter capture study include anterior capsule tear , corneal touch , capsulotomy diameter , contraption Zepto capsulotomy , size corneal incision pre post Zepto , interocular lens contraption evaluation zonular stability incidence severity adverse event . The criteria patient success access base successful completion 360 degree capsulotomy without tissue bridge posterior capsule rupture vitreous loss . The criterion study success access base great equal 95 percent case complete 360 degree capsulotomy without tissue bridge le 4 percent subject posterior capsule rupture vitreous loss .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must age 22 old , 2 . Subjects consent undergoing phacoemulsification IOL implant surgery treatment symptomatic age relate lens cataract , elect undergo ZeptoTM capsulotomy , 3 . Subjects must willing able return schedule treatment followup examination 3 month . 1 . Disease pathology treatment eye compromise visual performance refractive outcome ( e.g . previous refractive surgery ) , 2 . Zonular abnormality , 3 . Posterior polar cataract , 4 . Fellow eye acuity less 20/200 , 5 . Any prior ocular surgery study eye , 6 . Pupillary dilation preoperative exam le 7 mm diameter , 7 . Proliferative diabetic retinopathy , 8 . Disorders ocular muscle , nystagmus strabismus , 9 . Chronic uveitis , 10 . Abnormal corneal endothelium , 11 . Subjects medication , opinion surgeon , significant ocular side effect , 12 . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman , 13 . Implanted ocular device drug study eye , 14 . Any condition , judgment investigator would prevent subject complete study ( e.g . document diagnosis treatment symptom associate dementia , mental illness ) , 15 . Current participation another drug device clinical study , participation clinical study within six month .
